title: Yumx - Food Ordering App
desc: YumX is a mobile application designed to streamline the food ordering experience in a restaurant-like environment. It allows users to browse menus, place customized orders, and receive real-time updates—all through an intuitive and visually appealing interface.

title: GameLive - eSports App
desc: GameLive is a real-time mobile application built for eSports and gaming enthusiasts. It delivers up-to-date match scores, player stats, and game highlights directly to users, helping them stay connected with their favorite games and tournaments.
